name: @roarexclamation/paystack-ts-sdk
description: TypeScript SDK for Paystack API - A modern, type-safe client for payment processing in Africa

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate && npm run compile
scripts.generate: npm run generate:sdk && npm run generate:docs && npm run postgenerate
scripts.postgenerate: node scripts/fix-generated-code.js && node scripts/generate-dynamic-index.js && node scripts/generate-dynamic-docs.js
scripts.compile: npm run compile:cjs && npm run compile:esm && npm run compile:types && npm run copy-esm
scripts.copy-esm: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); function copyAndRename(src,dest){if(fs.statSync(src).isDirectory()){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>copyAndRename(path.join(src,file),path.join(dest,file)))}else if(src.endsWith('.js')){const content=fs.readFileSync(src,'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync(dest.replace('.js','.esm.js'),content)}} copyAndRename('./dist-esm','./dist'); fs.rmSync('./dist-esm',{recursive:true,force:true})"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm test && npm run lint
scripts.dev: npm run generate && npm run compile:types && tsc --watch

author: roarexclamation
